SENT.plain: Bilateral renal vein thrombosis and venous sinus thrombosis were diagnosed within 3 weeks of birth in a full-term neonate
Heterozygosity for a factor V mutation leading to resistance against the anticoagulatory properties of activated protein C was found
Heparin therapy led to resolution of the thrombotic manifestations
With long-term oral anticoagulation, no relapse or other thrombotic event occurred during infancy
